DOC.brief_summary: The study design assess effect heart-healthy diet include lean beef primary source high quality protein risk factor cardiovascular disease .
DOC.brief_title: Beef Optimal Lean Diet ( BOLD ) Effects Cardiovascular Disease ( CVD ) Risk
DOC.criteria: 1 . BMI > 20 < 37 2 . LDLC level 50th 90th percentile ( ±5 % assay variation ) accord NHANES data sex age ( ex . men : 128177 mg/dL woman : 121172 mg/dL ) 3 . TG level < 150 mg/dL Exclusion criterion include : 1. selfreported history myocardial infarction , stroke , diabetes mellitus , liver disease , kidney disease , thyroid disease ( unless control medication ) 2. high alcohol consumption ( ≥ 14 drinks/week ) 3. intake putative cholesterollowering supplement ( psyllium , fish oil capsule , soy lecithin , niacin , fiber , flax , phytoestrogens , stanol/sterol supplement food ) 4. treatment lipidlowering agent ( statin fibrates ) blood pressure control medication 5. vegetarian diet 6. weight loss gain ≥ 10 % body weight previous 6 month , 7. lactation , pregnancy , desire become pregnant study
